description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(689).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,210,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (26 +105*x +26*x^2 -x^3)/(1 -210*x^2 +x^4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_ Nov 21 2013a(n) = 210*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 21 2013
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[689], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(26 + 105 x + 26 x^2 - x^3)/(1 -210 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 21 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[26, 105, 5486, 22049]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 210*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 21 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
